abstract.p: Sports commentators in Detroit have complained about Detroit Tigers pitcher Justin Verlander's lack of national attention, which tends to lead to big commercial deals; Verlander as named American League's rookie of year last year (S)

block.p: What did Justin Verlander do the morning after he pitched the first no-hitter in Comerica Park in Detroit on Tuesday night? He went to Nordstrom and picked up a couple of suits, he told reporters.

That's the closest thing to an endorsement that Mr. Verlander appears to have made. Even though he was the rookie of the year in the American League last year, he has essentially operated under the baseball radar. Sports commentators in Detroit have complained about his lack of national attention, which tends to lead to big commercial deals.
